Release Notes:

The Shop Boyz are an Atlanta, Georgia-based rap group. They
are most notable for their current single title "Party Like a
Rockstar" off their debut album Rockstar Mentality.

The group consists of members Demetrius "Meanie" Hardin,
Richard "Fat" Stevens and Rasheed "Sheed" Hightower. When the
three met their current producer, Richard "Fire" Harris, the
group recorded a number of songs in what is considered a
unique style - hip hop with rock instrumentation, dubbed
"'Hood Rock."

The group's debut album, Rockstar Mentality, is scheduled to
be released through OnDeck Records, an imprint of Universal
Records. The lead single, "Party Like a Rockstar," has charted
on the Billboard rap charts as well as the Hot 100, and has
become a statement of sorts within the hip-hop community.
